directions.step:
1. CREAM BUTTER OR MARGARINE IN MIXER BOWL AT MEDIUM SPEED 1 TO 3 MINUTES OR UNITL LIGHT AND FLUFFY.
2. SIFT TOGETHER POWDERED SUGAR AND SALT; ADD TO CREAMED BUTTER OR MARGARINE.
3. PEEL AND MASH BANANAS; ADD MASHED BANANAS AND LEMON JUICE.
4. SPREAD IMMEDIATELY ON COOLED CAKES. :
NOTE: 1. FOR SIX 9-INCH (2 LAYER) CAKES: SPREAD ABOUT 1 3/4 CUPS (1 LB) FROSTING ON EACH CAKE.
NOTE: 2. FOR 13 DOZEN CUPCAKES: SPREAD ABOUT 1 TBSP FROSTING ON EACH CUPCAKE.
Recipe Number: G03901
SERVING SIZE: 2 TABLESPO
From the <Army Master Recipe Index File> (actually used today!). Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
